quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: This is the best film BYU has ever produced.

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: If winning was easy, even losers could do it.

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: If you want to sound smart then you should call them crepuscular rays and not God rays!

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: What you guys are doing is impossilble. It takes Pixar a team of 20 people and $10 million to make a short and they don't have English, Math and Religion classes.

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: Normally they have three winners for each category in the student Emmys. I feel bad for the other schools.

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if you guys get an Emmy. Look at Finding Dory. It was the highest grossing animated film of all time and it didn't even get nominated.

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: You guys have really made a cohesive group. And I didn't think that you would be at the beginning of the semster.

quotes.author: Brent
quotes.quote: We need you to submit more quotes from Brent into the tool_suggestions channel in slack!
